title: A Full Year Suspension?
description:
Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth, and Bill Barnwell debate which storyline is the most interesting heading into tonight’s Steelers/Browns game and their reactions to the news that Ime Udoka is likely facing a full season suspension. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: (Debatable): Ime Udoka is likely facing a full year suspension and what's most interesting about tonights Browns/Steelers matchup.
